Convicted cardinal wants to 'shout to the world' he is innocentCardinal Angelo Becciu, the most senior Roman Catholic Church official ever to be tried by a Vatican criminal court, professed his innocence on Monday in his first public comments since being found guilty of embezzlement and fraud. Mon, 18 Dec 2023 18:00:39 GMT PXM5SKCFO5NSHEC4HU7QUEFRWI https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/convicted-cardinal-wants-shout-world-he-is-innocent-2023-12-18/Reuters世界欧洲
Israel sees gradual transition to next phase of Gaza operationsIsrael will gradually transition to the next phase of its operations in Gaza in which the local population would likely be able to first return to the north of the coastal strip, the country's defence minister said on Monday. Mon, 18 Dec 2023 17:15:45 GMT Y6P4XCAXXBMZLLLXQWS5AI2SVQ https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/israel-sees-gradual-transition-next-phase-gaza-operations-2023-12-18/Reuters世界中东
France to act against 'radical' Israeli settlers, pushes to defuse Lebanon tensionFrance will impose measures on Israeli settlers who have attacked Palestinians in the occupied West Bank, its foreign minister said on Monday, a day after meeting Palestinian farmers in Ramallah, who had been targeted in recent weeks. Mon, 18 Dec 2023 17:13:48 GMT SFWHXIV73ZMR7P2RBW2GJXVPQE https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/france-act-against-radical-israeli-settlers-pushes-defuse-lebanon-tension-2023-12-18/Reuters世界中东
Sudan's RSF enters aid hub city where many were displacedSudan's Rapid Support Forces (RSF) on Monday entered Wad Madani, a city southeast of the capital that had taken in many displaced people and served as an aid hub over eight months of war, witnesses and RSF fighters said. Mon, 18 Dec 2023 16:26:11 GMT XUQRU3AOZRNGFNVABRG3TD63PU https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/sudans-rsf-says-it-has-entered-wad-madani-city-2023-12-18/Reuters世界非洲
Greece set to give migrants three-year permits to tackle labour shortageGreek lawmakers prepared to vote late on Monday on a bill allowing migrants to obtain a three-year residency and work permit, a step to tackle labour shortages in key sectors of an economy recovering from a debt crisis. Mon, 18 Dec 2023 16:25:02 GMT HICQZG3HNFPGNLKRGVUA6XCHUM https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/greece-set-give-migrants-third-year-permits-tackle-labour-shortage-2023-12-18/Reuters世界欧洲
Opposition parties reject Azerbaijan's snap election call as undemocraticAzerbaijan's two main opposition parties on Monday denounced the calling of a snap election, in which President Ilham Aliyev is expected to extend his 20 years in power, as undemocratic and said they would not field candidates. Mon, 18 Dec 2023 16:00:10 GMT O2MCAQR26NMW5MCUWVUOU7ILY https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/opposition-parties-reject-azerbaijans-snap-election-call-undemocratic-2023-12-18/Reuters世界亚太地区

Mon, 18 Dec 2023 15:55:52 GMT 5VXZEE6ADBNH7FNNQHE6Z37N44 https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ukraines-top-general-criticizes-presidents-firing-recruitment-chiefs-media-2023-12-18/Reuters世界欧洲
Serbian elections marred by president's involvement, vote buying - observersSerbia's snap elections have been marred by "unjust competition" by the ruling Serbian Progressive Party (SNS), the presence of President Aleksandar Vucic in the campaign, media bias and vote buying, an international monitoring mission said on Monday. Mon, 18 Dec 2023 15:53:24 GMT SUN5K3QTTNJSNM5M6PDFCIJ4J4 https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/serbian-elections-marred-by-presidents-involvement-vote-buying-observers-2023-12-18/Reuters世界欧洲
Polish truckers resume blockade of Ukrainian border crossingPolish truckers on Monday resumed their blockade of one of the main crossings at the Ukrainian border, a protest leader said, a week after it was temporarily lifted. Mon, 18 Dec 2023 15:02:27 GMT FXDO5FDZ5ZOUVM4RE3UBCMI3BQ https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/polish-truckers-resume-blockade-ukrainian-border-crossing-2023-12-18/Reuters世界欧洲
Unwashed and underfed, babies born into Gaza war face hardship in tentsThe grandmother has a simple wish for her twin baby granddaughters, Alma and Salma: they should be in a clean, safe room where they can be bathed. Mon, 18 Dec 2023 13:42:22 GMT 6ZIZWKOKDFKKZEO3QJQ4DRD2YI https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/unwashed-underfed-babies-born-into-gaza-war-face-hardship-tents-2023-12-18/Fadi Shana, Saleh Salem世界中东
Ukraine's army chief says situation at front line is not a stalemateUkraine's army chief said on Monday the situation on the front line of the war against Russian forces had not reached a stalemate. Red Sea attacks force rerouting of vessels, disrupting supply chainsAttacks by Yemen's Iran-aligned Houthi militants on ships in the Red Sea are disrupting maritime trade and prompting U.S. efforts to build a coalition to deal with the threat, as freight firms reroute around the Cape of Good Hope to avoid the Suez Canal. Mon, 18 Dec 2023 12:24:09 GMT S2FXMVTWS5NJDN5KSZMNLFMSUU https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/red-sea-attacks-force-rerouting-vessels-disrupting-supply-chains-2023-12-18/John Davison, Phil Stewart世界中东
Ukrainian troops face artillery shortages, scale back some operations - commanderFrontline Ukrainian troops face shortages of artillery shells and have scaled back some military operations because of a shortfall of foreign assistance, a senior army general told Reuters. Mon, 18 Dec 2023 11:31:00 GMT CYIJEGMJG5K75CS3O3S5RWSKLA https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ukrainian-troops-face-artillery-shortages-scale-back-some-operations-commander-2023-12-18/Olena Harmash, Tom Balmforth世界欧洲
Egypt's Sisi sweeps to third term as president with 89.6% of voteAbdel Fattah al-Sisi has swept to a third term as Egypt's president in an election where he faced no serious challengers, election authorities said on Monday, and he called the vote a rejection of the "inhumane war" in neighbouring Gaza. Mon, 18 Dec 2023 11:27:56 GMT RORIJMQAIVM5XIOIPWUPTDGXAE https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/results-due-egypt-election-with-sisi-expected-sweep-third-term-2023-12-18/Farah Saafan世界非洲
Wars raise profit outlook for US defense industry in 2024When the Pentagon pulled the world's biggest defense contractors into a meeting to tell them to ramp up production shortly after Russia invaded Ukraine, one CEO hesitated, saying they did not want to be stuck with a warehouse full of rockets when the fighting stopped, according to three people familiar with the discussion. Mon, 18 Dec 2023 11:06:45 GMT QO3677UJBBMMBCUPKV5JBDBNMM https://www.reuters.com/business/aerospace-defense/wars-raise-profit-outlook-us-defense-industry-2024-2023-12-18/Mike Stone商业航空航天与国防
Trump would install loyalists to reshape U.S. foreign policy on China, NATO and UkraineDonald Trump in a second term would likely install loyalists in key positions in the Pentagon, State Department and CIA whose primary allegiance would be to him, allowing him more freedom than in his first presidency to enact isolationist policies and whims. Mon, 18 Dec 2023 11:05:21 GMT LS24WETJS5LWTHS2HGWLTQOXEU https://www.reuters.com/world/us/trump-install-loyalists-reshape-us-foreign-policy-diplomats-gird-doomsday-2023-12-18/Gram Slattery, Simon Lewis, Idrees Ali, Phil Stewart世界美国
Vessel attacked in Red Sea off Yemen coast, US blames HouthisYemen's Houthi movement attacked two commercial ships in the Red Sea with naval drones on Monday, the Iran-backed group said, the latest in a surge of attacks over Israel's military campaign in Gaza. Mon, 18 Dec 2023 06:47:11 GMT 6HRYZOY63VKFHLEXGHGXBHQMQQ https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/ukmto-ambrey-report-possible-explosion-south-yemens-port-mokha-2023-12-18/Ahmed Elimam, Phil Stewart, Terje Solsvik世界中东
At least 13 killed in Guinea oil terminal blast; extent of damage unclearThe death toll from a blast at an oil terminal in Guinea's capital Conakry on Monday has risen to 13, a senior police source said, as the government warned the incident could have repercussions for the wider population. Mon, 18 Dec 2023 06:28:07 GMT BAESHSTFINP6BLBFTLALWFXT5I https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/several-feared-killed-guinea-oil-terminal-blast-police-officer-2023-12-18/Saliou Samb世界非洲
U.S. defence chief in Israel in push to ease intensity of Gaza offensiveIsrael faced pressure from the visiting U.S. defence chief and censure from a global rights group on Monday over the intensity of its war with Hamas in Gaza due to spiralling civilian deaths and hunger among Palestinians. Mon, 18 Dec 2023 02:53:18 GMT OZYL6UE4D5IGTA267IWS2P3A4A https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/israeli-forces-launch-strikes-up-down-gaza-strip-hospital-hit-2023-12-18/Nidal Al-Mughrabi, Bassam Masoud, Henriette Chacar世界中东
North Korea fires ICBM after condemning US 'war' movesNorth Korea fired an intercontinental ballistic missile on Monday that has a range to hit anywhere in the United States, said South Korea and Japan, marking its second launch in hours as Pyongyang condemned a U.S.-led show of force as "war" moves. Sun, 17 Dec 2023 23:37:53 GMT LVRZHU4L35KY3LRN57XVXX3AC4 https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/north-korea-fires-ballistic-missile-south-korea-says-2023-12-17/Soo-Hyang Choi, Kantaro Komiya世界亚太地区
